name: Wheat Run
description:
Intro

Your goal is to harvest as much wheat as possible. Each wheat spike gives you a +1. If you hit a rock you lose 5 spikes. It's game over when your spikes go negative.

How much can you score?

Commands

A/D or left/right arrow to move.

Note

This is my first Ludum Dare entry, I know it's not much but I've picked up Unity 2 days ago. This was just an opportunity to learn a new technology.

The soundtrack was generated with: https://www.aiva.ai/
